website_summaries.verdict: A tough camera meant to handle being dropped repeatedly. Good for both younger and older children.
pros: The large buttons are easy to press and understand
Super durable and can withstand being dropped
Auto shut-off to conserve power and the camera is comfortable to hold, even for little hands
Special effects can be added to photos with packaged software
cons: Expensive, produces low-quality photos, and there's no flash

customer_reviews.title: Terrible pictures, fun noises
customer_reviews.text: I would give it fewer stars but the kids do play with it sometimes so I guess the fun noises are a bit appealing. The picture screen is tiny, which might be okay if the picture quality was at all decent. It is not. Grainy to the point of being unrecognizable. Super slow response time. The kids don't even really look at the pictures, they just like the idea of going around and snapping pictures while making the fun picture-taking noises. I could have purchased a much less expensive fake camera toy.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Super durable and fun kids camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kids camera! My son has had the older version since he was about 2 and he is now 9! All of my kids friends and cousins that come over to play always pick up this camera to take pictures with and play with it! The picture quality isn't the greatest, but the kids have a blast using the camera. The camera is super durable the entire casing is rubber, so it can hold up to being dropped on the ground many times. I would recommend this camera for kids 2-7! It makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Mowdy

customer_reviews.title: Not quite kid-tough
customer_reviews.text: My toddler daughter quickly figured out how to take pictures with this cute, basic camera. Unfortunately, she discovered how to delete them just as quickly--the erase button is bright red! I put a piece of tape over it, which stopped her from deleting all of her pictures. I don't like that a cord (not included) is necessary for transfer, and wish there were a less complicated way to transfer pictures. Alas, my daughter eventually dropped this and the images became blurry. Not quite kid-tough enough, I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My son has had this camera for a year and has gotten so much use out of it! We first got it for him when he was 2. In the past year he has taken so many pictures on it and there is still memory/space which surprised me. He loves taking it everywhere - zoo, car trips, parties. It has also been dropped many times and works perfectly. My only complaint is that I wish the screen that displays the pictures he has taken was bigger since they are a bit hard to see on the little screen. Overall, I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin E

customer_reviews.title: Fun Learning
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this camera. He likes taking pictures of everything and laughing at the results. He especially loves taking pictures of his feet, the dog, Daddy lounging on the couch watching his favorite shows. He's 3 years old. At first, my husband thought, we could have bought him a regular digital camera, but I beg to differ. I preferred this to a real digital camera for a 3 year old. It seems unbreakable, plus it's colorful and it makes funny noises when you snap the picture. You can also download the pics to your pc for more learning and showing opportunity with the kiddies. I'm Glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tough toy, but a battery suck and bad shutter delay
customer_reviews.text: This is a tough little camera and my 3 year old really likes playing with it. HOWEVER...the batteries die really quickly and there is quite a delay when taking pictures. Almost every picture he has taken are a blurry swirl because he snaps the picture and moves along to take a picture of the next thing and ends up getting a picture seconds later. That doesn't seem like a long time, but it is. And try explaining to a little kid/toddler that he needs to WAIT before moving. I gave it three stars because he really does love playing with it and he'll eventually learn to stay still (hopefully).
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought two Fisher-Price Kid-Tough Digital Cameras as Christmas gifts for my nephews this year, ages 4 and 3. They liked them and they did what was promised, but I was disappointed in the photo quality. The images, in review, are quite grainy and unfocused. This is including photos taken by adults; I did take that into consideration before passing judgment. I haven't seen what the photos may look like once they've been downloaded/printed, but I was disappointed initially. The ease of use, though, was spot on for my budding photographers. They definitely had fun taking their pictures with it and the sound effects when turning it on/off, retrieving the photos, etc. were kid-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Durable but poor picture quality
customer_reviews.text: This camera is very kid friendly and durable which is great for little kids. However, the picture quality is quite poor. Pictures turn out quite grainy and look almost "smokey" at times. It is easy for kids to use and my son was very excited to have his own camera. As a starter camera, this isn't the worst product but if you want something that takes decent pictures this is not the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Snols82

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful camera
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these, one for a 3 year old boy and another for a 4 year old girl. I absolutely love these! At first i was disappointed at the quality of photo it took. I wanted the kids to be able to take photos and use them but it didn't seem that was possible. Then i connected them to the computer and was amazed! My daughter took some amazing photos with this and I wouldn't have known had I not connected it. Several of her photos we enlarged and are pn her wall now for her to look at all the time. I couldn't be more pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is just awful, I know this was made for kids but unfortunately there are other cameras on the market for kids that are better than this one :( the pictures were very blurry and was so slow capturing photos.
customer_reviews.author: usmc85

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for kids
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very sturdy. Dropped, kicked, thrown and it still works. The only down side is that you have to hold the camera pretty still to get a clear picture. But saying that my 3 year old LOVES to take pictures of any and everything. He doesn't care what the look like. It is pretty cool has a little display screen on the back so they can see what they are taking. Also very kid friendly buttons and use. It does not have a flash...which at first was a downer, but easily forgotten.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jean

customer_reviews.title: Say Cheese!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was always taking my phone and taking pictures with it, so I decided it was time for him to have his owm camera. He is 4 years old and loves it. He takes pictures of everything and I mean EVERYTHING!! Everyone has to be watching for him hiding behind a door ready to bounce out and catch you on film. This camera is very sturdy and has taken many tumbles. It is very kid friendly. It does not take great pictures but good enough where you can tell what the picture is about. It also has a memory card so all your childs masterpeices can be transferred to the computer or another device. It's a fun toy!
customer_reviews.author: Helene  "Laney"

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for a curious preschooler +
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our 4 year old son on his birthday. It's definitely built tough, as we also have a 17 mo old in the house who throws it :( Despite that- it is working perfectly and our four year old loves taking his own pictures with it! What more can you ask for in a camera for kids? Plus you can plug it into the computer and upload the pictures. The pictures are grainy, but he doesn't mind one bit. Batteries seem to last quite a while, which is also a perk. I highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Goblin

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Macs!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions state you can connect this to a Mac as a USB storage device to transfer the photos...you can not. This camera is not recognized by OSX and therefore is pretty worthless to me, you can not transfer the photos from your camera to the Mac. I am returning it and purchased the Vtech Kidizoom which works perfectly with Windows and Macs. Fisher - Price get with the times, Mac outsells Windows in many markets. But please, we don't want your bloated and poorly designed software, just a simple USB file transfer. I make my living in IT, if you use a Mac do not buy this camera.
customer_reviews.author: S.Gro

customer_reviews.title: Great for little kids
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my son when he was three and he was able to start taking pictures right away. It's a little slow on the reaction time, but we taught him to just hold it until he heard the shutter sound. I like the fact that it turns itself off too. Plus, we've had this since Christmas and it's now June and we haven't had to replace the batteries or take off any pictures. It really holds a lot and the batteries last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Giwdul

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to take a good picture
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to take a clear picture. My kids took 879 pictures in four days and almost none are usable. Yes, thay are little and not skilled but that is who the camera is made for. I even tried to see if it was skill based but it isn't. Their cousins got a more expensive camera that is superior in every way. Their pictures were clear amd the camera can do picture manipulations. I will definitely invest in that next time.
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Love the durability and ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I didn't give this a 5th star was image quality. I understand to keep the price cost effective for a camera like this the LCD display cant be hi rez, but this seems to be weaker than I would expect in todays camera and LCD availability. It doesn't bother my son at all and he loves the camera and uses it regularly. But I wonder how long it will be before he notices how grainy those pictures are.
customer_reviews.author: TeamTribble

customer_reviews.title: Great first camera
customer_reviews.text: Great first camera for my 3 year old! He loves being able to do everything for himself. The buttons are very easy to push and easy to tell what they do. It takes quite decent pictures if the camera is held still, but not if moving. Honestly though I'm not worried about the quality of photo as I am just wanting my child to have the independence and learn how to do it for himself. His hand will steady as he gets older!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: So this was for my almost 4-year old son. It was pricey - in my opinion. My son loves to take pictures with my camera and I thought this would be great for him to have his own. It doesn't have a clear screen at all. You can hardly see the images after they are taken. I wish it were a little less "kid" and a little more "camera." Kids like stuff that's more realistic and like what the adults use. It is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a waste. Poor picture quality and by the time they ...
customer_reviews.text: What a waste. Poor picture quality and by the time they are old enough to use it they could use a cheap real camera instead, but actually get good quality pictures. It did what it said it would, but it is rarely used and the pictures are crappy and the digital screen sucks to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mc

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Pictures are a little blurry but toddlers don't care about picture quality. My son has a great time using his camera and at two years old he mastered the buttons quickly. We recently took this to the zoo with us and he had a great time capturing photos of all the animals. It's been dropped and thrown several times without a scratch. Doesn't come with a USB cable but the one for our good digital camera works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: ToddlerMom

customer_reviews.title: Tough for any age
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for twin 4 year old boys. These things can take a good beating. Its a great starter camera for little ones. It is funny to see life from their perspective after I download to computer. Some pics are blurry, but that is due to moving before shutter captures pic. We've taught them to keep still until they hear the camera noise and pics have gotten better.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Zatchey

customer_reviews.title: Ok for little kids, but is has very terrible image qulity even for kids.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2 year old that thinks this thing is awesome, so that is a win for this camera. However, it has major motion blur when using the color screen. Pictures take a few seconds longer then it needs to, to process. The image quality is the worst I've seen on any camera dating back to the very first digital cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: New Photographer in Our Family
customer_reviews.text: We gave our grandson this camera for Christmas because his mother's camera is too expensive to be used as a toy. He loves it and is under the impression that it is the real thing! He has taken advantage of all photo opps and took some very good pictures at our local zoo. He figured out how to use it by himself. The discovery of each feature has brought him a sense of satisfaction with his photography skills.
customer_reviews.author: whitewater

customer_reviews.title: Good for a toy camera
customer_reviews.text: It is a toy after all, so I didn't expect great pics. The electronic shutter speed (are they call shutters on digital cameras?)is a bit slow, so my 4 year olds pics come out pretty blurry. My attempt at getting a good shot wasnt much better. But it is very fun for my boiy and he loves having his own. Very sturdy. I would recommend it to anyone, but dont expect artistic quality pics from it.
customer_reviews.author: Don Wade

customer_reviews.title: hard to use, slow, like a phone camera ~10 years ago
customer_reviews.text: very slow camera; yes it performs like a camera phone in the 10 years ago. very hard to use. I could figure out how to pull the images from the camera. both my mac/pc could not recognize the camera's built-in memory. It could be that one I got is defective.
customer_reviews.author: java

customer_reviews.title: Great intro to photography for younger ages.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item for our 4 yr. old grandson for Christmas. While visiting there, we went on a nature walk, and our grandson had a blast taking pictures of all the scenery. Like a typical kid, he dropped the camera at least three times, with no damage whatsoever. The pictures are surprisingly clear for such a moderately priced toy. It's great that the pictures can be uploaded to the computer for saving long term.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great for a beginning photographer!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for my grandson's 2nd birthday. As soon as he opened the gift, we put in the batteries and he began taking pictures. The camera was easy to use and it did not take him anytime at all to figure out how to hold it and take a picture. The pictures looked good...though he took a few interesting shots of the floor, people's feet, etc. We can't wait to load them into the computer.
customer_reviews.author: A reader

customer_reviews.title: awesome kids camera
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my 3 year old nephew for Christmas. He always plays with his mom's digital camera so why not get him his own? He LOVES it! It is so easy to use, he had it all figured out and was taking pictures in about 30 seconds! It is durable... not going to break when he drops it, and makes cool sounds to let him know what he is doing. Really an awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Lynn

customer_reviews.title: The boys love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two as Christmas gifts for my boys 2 & 4 years old. They have taken pictures of all the family, one another and their gifts. The design is bulky for my 2 year old but perfect for the 4 year old. No, there is no flash. Which is not an issue for us. The screen resolution is not the highest quality but the boys don't mind.
customer_reviews.author: Cocoa N.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for a young child
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for my cousin's 4 year old as a gift. He loved it, and enjoyed taking pictures of everyone. The thing that made me uneasy is the fact it doesn't come with the cord and you have to purchase one separately. I was aware of this by the description before purchasing, but i still think at that price it really should be included.
customer_reviews.author: Thurston

customer_reviews.title: Everything we expected!
customer_reviews.text: This camera has been great for our 4-yr-old. It works great, pics upload onto computer easily, and it's held up great to abuse and typical 4 year old use. Of course the pics are not the same quality as a camera an adult would use but we didn't expect that. My child has enjoyed the freedom of taking her own pics and having them be real.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Patel

customer_reviews.title: Kids love the camera and it's durable enough to survive their every use
customer_reviews.text: Kids love the camera and it's durable enough to survive their every use. Only thing that goes wrong is that the batteries need changing more often than I'd like, but that's probably due to them forgetting to turn it off when done (there is an automatic shut off, though)
customer_reviews.author: R. Rubin

customer_reviews.title: He loves seeing his pictures after he takes them and loved the exaggerated noises the camera makes
customer_reviews.text: My son likes this camera. It gets dropped and thrown a lot but has held up for almost a year. He loves seeing his pictures after he takes them and loved the exaggerated noises the camera makes. I just wish it had a flash.
customer_reviews.author: LindsMc1

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this camera for our 4 year old son last Christmas and it is still in great condition and going strong, despite being used and abused! Would definitely recommend for the under 6 age range, or for any little rough and tumble boy who also loves technology. Our 7 year old daughter enjoyed this as well, but seemed a little too "advanced" for this basic kiddie cam. Still a great purchase that gets a lot of use one year later!
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old boy loved, and I loved to see the world through his eyes. Kids have a completely different point of view and this camera makes it possible for us to grasp it: just leave the camera with them and see what has driven their attention after a good while. Binocular viewfinder mekes easy for the kids to frame running cats or other difficult subjects. Camera is lightwheight and sturdy. Don't expect HD pictures, it has slightly less than VGA resolution, but enough to open pictures on a PC screen.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A B Fernandes

customer_reviews.title: Little Photographer
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 year old got this for Christmas. It didn't take him long to figure out all the buttons and what they do. He doesn't seem to like looking into the camera to take a picture since you can see what your taking on the little screen. So far so good with it as he hasn't dropped it yet but the rubber around it will definatley protect it from any damage. You can upload the photos to a computer but have to buy the cord seperatley as it don't come with it.
customer_reviews.author: luvbeingmummy

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but will not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: This has worked out well for my 5yo grandson. It takes pretty decent pictures, is easy for him to use and so far (3mos later) seems to be rugged enough to handle a child's care. He doesn't abuse it, so it's not like it's been thrown around or anything like that. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: England

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4-year old son who was always wanting to use my camera. He loves it! It makes sounds when he takes pictures, is easy to use, and he can look back at the pictures he has taken. I also like that I can download the pics to my pc, although you need to have your own connection wire to do so. I did not give this camera 5 stars because the resolution quality is not the best, but I did not expect it to be for a fairly inexpensive kids camera.
customer_reviews.author: MammaG

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but fine
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old son loves to take pictures with me. He loves to carry this and take photos in gardens, out walking around, etc., and he likes that he sees the image instantly on the back. The resolution and quality is absolutely horrible, but considering his age it is fantastic! A very good starter camera!
customer_reviews.author: 2readornot2read

customer_reviews.title: This has been an amazing gift for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: Kid tough is right! This has been an amazing gift for my toddler. It works well, the functions are easy for children to navigate and uploading the pictures onto the computer was very simple. The design keeps the camera safe from bumps, scratches, and major falls from countertops, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Caruso

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Goes through batteries extremely fast, picture quality is terrible even for the low expectations we had for a kid camera, has a shutter delay after pressing the button that results in child frustration when pictures are of the ceiling or floor instead of his subject. So disappointed in this purchase. Would have returned but packaging was wisked away in the christmas morning cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: birthday gift fron grandson
customer_reviews.text: perfect for my 6 yr old grandson's birthday - older sister got one for her 6th birthday and he was always wanting to use hers - that I could get in blue was great! Is tough, user friendly, and encourages the love of saving moments
customer_reviews.author: wilma mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, my kids love it even more; this is the second one I buy, first one my kids dropped on a water bucket, I contacted Fisher price and they send me a check, this company stands by their products, would not hesitate to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Artlight

customer_reviews.title: Fun, Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: makes fun sounds and takes decent pics. no, they are not a very high quality but my 2 year old niece wont care. I cannot wait for her to open it this christmas. I opened it myself to see how easy it was to use. She will be working it like a pro in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Love

customer_reviews.title: Small screen, geared for 3yr olds, not 7yr olds
customer_reviews.text: I didnt even get this out of the package, I bought it for my soon to be 7 yr old son and it is geared way more for a 3 yr old than a 7 year old. I bet this would be fine for the lower end of the age range but not up to 7! Also, the screen on the back is tiny, like a postage stamp size
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Enos

customer_reviews.title: kid friendly camera
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this camera for our 2 1/2 year old grand daughter. She had a little trouble at first but then figured out all the buttons. She has had a lot of fun with it and it has withstood all the dropping and banging. It is an excellent learning toy for little ones who normally are at the other end of the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Golf Addict

customer_reviews.title: Durable for sure
customer_reviews.text: It's not as great as I was hoping for. The kids like to play with it......occasionally but the picture quality is just terrible and the ease of uploading the pictures on the computer wasn't what I was hoping for. I wouldn't buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: KaylaB

customer_reviews.title: Seemed nice, but my kids weren't interested and I returned ...
customer_reviews.text: Seemed nice, but my kids weren't interested and I returned it, though not due to a fault of the product.. These days, it seems like it could have a flash and better resolution, even if it is a children's toy.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha E. Z.

customer_reviews.title: my 29 month old boy really love this camera
customer_reviews.text: my 29 month old boy really love this camera! he took so many pics with my cell phone so i bought this to avoid the contact the smart phone from him. and he's playing with this for some time, so succeeded.
customer_reviews.author: Yoo

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works good, especially for a child's camera. My complaints would be a slow response when taking the picture, you have to wait a few seconds to hear it "click" and the digital screen isn't all that great. But for kids, it's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for little kids.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for what our boy wants it to do. Have never actually tried to save off or print any of the pictures as he is only interested in the taking of them. It's been dropped and tossed aside plenty and still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Piawlock

customer_reviews.title: Good kids camera
customer_reviews.text: My kids love using this camera. The picture quality isn't great but it isn't terrible either. The key is to hold the camera STILL when pressing the picture taking button. That can be hard for little kids but my kids still love using this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: picture view box is too small
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves to take pictures with his dads android. I thought I would get him his own camera. I think he as used it once. He was barely able to see the pictures that were taken. The picture quality is very grainy and if you are not in a room with all the lights on your picure will not come out. I am very disappointed with this product. I know it is for kids but come on, a 1" by 1" view screen is quite small.
customer_reviews.author: Stay at home Mom of 3 boys

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My sons 3 and 5 years both can take pictures with it and look back through the ones they have taken. The image on the camera display definately leaves something to be desired but they are proud of the pictures they take. Once downloaded they are much better.
customer_reviews.author: CB Endeavors

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a budding photographer
customer_reviews.text: My 4-year-old always stole my camera, so I got him one of his own. It's easy to use, and he loves taking pictures. He doesn’t much care about looking at them once he's taken them, but for me it's amazing to see the world through his eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Marie Hinchey

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for out 2.5 year old for Christmas. He always wants to use our camera and see the picture and show everyone. So we thought this would be a good idea. The camera is very durable. The screen on the back is not very large compared to our camera. Taking a picture, there is about a two second delay so the child has to wait without moving the camera. Yeah right. The screen is very low resolution and very hard to see the image. I have not even tried to print the pictures. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: monicacphtrx

customer_reviews.title: This camera doesn't walk the walk.
customer_reviews.text: Although this camera has some very nice features, it does NOT come with a USB cord or its own software. You have to provide your own USB cable and go to their website to download the software. That is a serious thumbs down for this camera.
customer_reviews.author: jessieinsanfrancisco

customer_reviews.title: Fun age perfect camera!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old really likes this. The only down side is pictures do not turn out well in dull lighting. Bright light is best quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joliene Garlich

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for little hands!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I am buying as my daughter's has held up so well for the past year, my son is now getting one too! Only wish it could do video or connect to mac computers to print pictures!
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Low quality pics
customer_reviews.text: This is very poor camera. The quality is so bad that is almost useless as a real camera. It is much more like a fake camera, a toy camera. The idea that we had when we bought was thar our daughter could use this to take her own pictures without needing to worry with dropping the cam on the floor. Well, it looks resistant, but the photo quality is very bad.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, very disappointed child!
customer_reviews.text: The digital display on he back if so tiny you can hardly see the picture. There is a delay after pushing the button so when taking a picture my son ,who's 3, always moves and it comes out blurry. Very disappointed in this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Brenna W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift so daddy's electronics live longer
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of using mom and daddy's cell phones, electronic cameras and a multitude of objects that are not cameras at all to take pretend pictures, we decided our 3-yeard-old had made his point clear. This camera is easy to use, very durable, very safe, and he has tons of fun with it. As others have remarked, the picture quality is not stellar, but it's a minor quibble. This is a perfect camera for children, maybe the best one of them all. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Noel L.

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: I don't write reviews unless I feel very strongly about something. My 2 year old loves taking pictures so we for him this for Christmas! It is the worst camera ever. The only thing it seems to have going for it may be durability. The image is so terrible my son can't even tell what he's taking a picture of. To print out the photos is a waste of money! I hate this camera. Save your money and buy your child a cheap real camera that actually takes better quality pictures. This is a toy not a camera!
customer_reviews.author: Lrbeiggs

customer_reviews.title: Neat toy
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves this camera. It's easy for him to use, durable so my toddler can't destroy it, and it teaches him the concept of taking pictures. It does not take high quality photos, but it gets the job done. Definitely a hit in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Lady J

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun. Preschooler loves this
customer_reviews.text: Durable and fun. Preschooler loves this. We got it for my son when he was almost 3 and have been using it for over a year and haven't even needed to charge it. Its great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great first camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera works as advertized. Takes just a little practice to figure out the buttons. The kids have dropped it several times - with no damage. Wish it had a wrist/neck cord or a place to attach one. Then it might get dropped a little less. Over all - a good product for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: memaw

customer_reviews.title: the best present I ever gave my grandson
customer_reviews.text: This is the best present I ever gave my grandson as far as usage and continued interest. He takes the camera everywhere and is always taking pictures. I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of pictures, they are very good.
customer_reviews.author: paul k.

customer_reviews.title: got this for my 3 year old great nephew and he is in love with it
customer_reviews.text: got this for my 3 year old great nephew and he is in love with it, now he doesn't need to use my camera, he really enjoys taking pictures, made a perfect birthday present
customer_reviews.author: vsunfish

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Great in theory, and I understand it is just a toy. But, the screen to look though is VERY slow to respond, and is VERY blurry. The sounds it makes are great, and it seems very durable thus far. Was just expecting a little better quality from a top name toys manufacturer, over a no name one. For this price, just buy the cheapest normal one you can find, and keep replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: bodaciuos

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought it before Christmas for around $20 on a whim for me 2.5 year old. Turned out to be her favorite gift! It's easy to use and has provided hours of fun for her. The picture quality is what you would expect, pretty poor. But I'm really trying to get her into photography so this is our first step. It has literally been thrown down the stairs, dropped on concrete, and several other unfortunate things, and is still in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase for little boy! He loved it...it has lasted for 4.5 years! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: jeng

customer_reviews.title: 3 1/2 yr old loves it
customer_reviews.text: My grandson asked for a camera for Christmas! I didn't even know they made cameras for little children, lol. But they do! This one looked sturdy, so its the one I chose. He is LOVING it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Tilghman Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: My son the klutz who is 8 drops everything. He likes this camera. It's very rough and tumble and works well. He can preview on the back screen. It's not a top of the line camera but it works, even after being dropped repeatedly. Picture quality is good for him. The only but is but it doesn't have a flash which is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Grzesiak

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera for a small child
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these cameras we have bought. Our Grandchildren both love the toy and the first one we bought is 2 years old and is in good working order. We have one more child to buy one for, and she will get it for Christmas next year. We gave them each there own when they turned 4.
customer_reviews.author: gjgant

customer_reviews.title: Great for the little camera bugs in your family.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for my 4 yr. old Grandson for Christmas. It seems very durable and he really enjoyed taking pictures with it while he was here. I would defintely recommend it for children. Amazon always provides quick shipping also.
customer_reviews.author: nmp

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it years ago for my first born. It still works great and my 2 year old toddler is giving a final QC Inspection.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Perez

customer_reviews.title: needs flash
customer_reviews.text: Very good as a toy camera. Have not, and probably will not upload any to the computer to print so can't rate that. If it had a flash it would perform even better, could also use a little better view screen. Overall as a toy and for the 25$ I spent it does just what my four year old desires.
customer_reviews.author: T. kramer

customer_reviews.title: Kids will love this
customer_reviews.text: This was a great produce for my 3 year old niece for her birthday. As an adult, the screen is VERY small, but I was excited that it worked exactly like a regular camera. The shutter is definitely slower than a regular digital camera, but again, it's perfect for a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey L

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My son has already managed to drop it, after only having it a few days, and it is still in great working condition. So far, it actually takes decent quality pictures and this is a great little device for kids to learn on.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Toth-Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Kids camera
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother, kids now and days know the difference even at 4/5 it will just end up in the bottom of the toy box.you can get real,one for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: jayson mitchell

customer_reviews.title: the viewing lenses were not clear. Everything was double ...
customer_reviews.text: the viewing lenses were not clear. Everything was double image. Not sure if the item I received was just defective.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my two year old and he has so much fun. We took him to Disneyland and now he has his own pictures of Mickey and grandpa. He loves it !
customer_reviews.author: Gayle R.

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy, easy for him to hold
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our toddler for Christmas. He loves it! It is very sturdy, easy for him to hold, and the buttons are the perfect size for him. The picture quality is low, but he doesn't care one bit.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Nephew has become a poparazzi with this camera.
customer_reviews.text: Like most kids, my nephew wants to get into whatever the adults are doing and thinks their toys are better. At least it was that way until we got him this camera. He loves taking the pictures and then showing everyone the pictures he has taken on the back of his camera. He is an active kid who is constantly underfoot and everywhere he goes his camera comes along. Just watch out...most kids like my nephew lack judgment and whatever they encounter, including a sibling's diaper, are fair game for the camera!
customer_reviews.author: John E. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: My grandson is very happy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson 3 years old loves this gift. I know there are other more sophisticated cameras for kids but this one is very nice for a 3 year old kid. I would say that an older child would not be impressed with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Tere

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew and he loves it. He's 4 and can work it on his own and he loves it. He dropped it once and no problems with camera functions
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it. He was able to figure out ...
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it. He was able to figure out how to use within 5 minutes (age 5) and loves taking photos.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Kid tuff
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for kids even better for children with ASD
customer_reviews.author: cowboysangel2002

customer_reviews.title: OKAY.
customer_reviews.text: The camera is sturdy and is built for a lot of abuse. However, the photo quality is far below par. I almost would have been better off buying my son a disposable camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kali4nia

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for little hands
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for my five year old nephew because he seemed to be fascinated with pictures. He loves it and has taken numerous photographs with it... Needless to say he photographed everything he could lay his eyes on e first day that he got it :). You should bear in mind though that this is a real 'toy' camera. It actually takes photos which can be uploaded to a computer, but it is not the Canon Rebel - the quality photos are not crisp and clear but if you want a great camera for a child to enjoy that can be dropped without breaking, then this one would fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old son loved this camera. He never had one before but always wanted to play with ours so it was perfect for him to get his own. Holds alot of pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Pattyf

customer_reviews.title: Mommy dear
customer_reviews.text: The camera it self is good. The viewing screen needs to be bigger. Also after a week or so our camera broke. It would turn on and view the pictures. But we couldn't take any pictures. So needless to say we have been waiting for a new one. Which they r back order. It has been over 2 weeks that we have been waiting.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a toddler!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3-year-old niece and she absolutely loves it. We were told she spent the whole day taking pictures! No complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: A. E. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: He can handle it just fine and has figured out the buttons and everything
customer_reviews.text: My 3yr old son loves it. He can handle it just fine and has figured out the buttons and everything. Great toy.
customer_reviews.author: sickpuppyz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old and he wont stop taking pictures he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ltapia

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy For Our 2 Year Old!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves taking pictures with our cell phones, so when I found an amazing deal for this kid's camera we snagged the opportunity. He loves playing around and taking pictures of us, and his toys, and it makes him feel like a big boy. I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves this camera
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old grandson is blind. He loves to take pictrues and he loves to hear funny sounds. This camera makes it it easy for him to experience both.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bata

customer_reviews.title: Fun picture-taking.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old grandson loves this camera. It's easy to operate (not too many buttons to figure out) and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: CNye

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My little grandson is going to love this. He will love being able to take his pictures. I can't wait to see his face when he opens his Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: rissa33

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Kid-Tough Digital Camera, Blue
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingIt's a real digital camera that's kid friendly and built to survive, drop after drop after drop. Features easy & child friendly controls with a new sleek design. Kids can take pictures and view them instantly on the color screen. Inbuilt memory stores up to 2000 pictures, 4X digital zoom, dual eye viewfinder, enhanced imager for good low light performance, and downloadable PC based software for special effects (stampers, frames, etc.). Requires 4 AAA (LR03) Alkaline 1.5V. Not Included. Please dispose of batteries safely. 3-7 Windows is a registered trademark of Microsoft Corporation in the United States and other countries. Mac is a trademark of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.

AMAZON.COM
Built tough enough for kids—and now even better! This kid-tough camera is a real digital camera that's tough enough to stand up to the ways kids play and the places they go. Now it has even more features, for better pictures in more situations! For children ages 3 years and up.

 



Easy to hold and has big buttons perfect for preschoolers to press!


Survives drop after drop after drop.
Lots of Features! 
The Kid-Tough Digital Camera is the perfect size for little hands to hold. This camera features sturdy, dual hand grips for steady shots and big buttons that are easy for preschoolers to press. The two-eye viewing is easy for kids to look through and allows them to see exactly what they are taking a picture of. This camera has a large 1.4” color screen that lets kids see pictures they’ve taken—instantly! In addition, the 4X digital zoom feature lets kids get a close up shot! 

Download Photos to Your Computer 
The Kid-Tough Digital Camera stores over 2,000 pictures and has 256 MB built-in memory. Once these photos are downloaded onto your computer – kids can edit the photos by adding stamps, frames, and more with the PC based downloadable photo editor software. Not only does this camera allow preschoolers to have their very own camera – it allows them to use their creativity to make each photo special with their own artistic touch. Once photos are saved on your computer they can be deleted off the camera to make room for more picture-taking adventures!

 

Kid-Tough and Built to Last! 
The Kid Tough Digital Camera is a preschooler's very own digital camera that makes it easy for them to take and view pictures. Now, preschoolers can join in on the fun of taking pictures and parents can feel assured that the Kid-Tough Digital Camera is built to last and survive drop after drop after drop! 

 What's In The Box? 
Kid-Tough Digital Camera and instructions. 




The Kid-Tough Digital Camera comes in two different colors! 


FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Built tough enough for kids—and now even better. It’s a real digital camera that's tough enough to stand up to the ways kids play and the places they go. And now it has even more features, for better pictures in more situations. Features: Two-eye viewing—easy for kids to look through, Stores over 2,000 pictures, 256 MB built-in memory, Sturdy, dual hand grips for steady shots, Big buttons—easy for little hands to use, Enhanced low light performance—no flash needed,, 1.4” color screen lets kids see pictures they’ve taken—instantly, 4X digital zoom. Download photo editing software to your computer. Requires 4 AAA batteries.

See more
feature_bullets: Built to survive drop, after drop, after drop
Features easy and child friendly controls
Features: 1.44 TFT colored screen, Inbuilt memory that stores over 2000+picures, 0.3 mega pixel imager, 4x digital zoom
Enhanced imager for good low light performance
Add fun special effects with downloadable software
